    • Method Detail

      • settings

        public void settings()
        Initialise the setting of the window size.
        Overrides:
        settings in class processing.core.PApplet

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Load all resources such as images. Initialise the elements such as the player, enemies and map elements.
        Overrides:
        setup in class processing.core.PApplet

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Receive key pressed signal from the keyboard.
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class processing.core.PApplet

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased()
        Receive key released signal from the keyboard.
        Overrides:
        keyReleased in class processing.core.PApplet

      • drawLayout

        public void drawLayout()
        Forms all necessary text and visual indicators/timers such as mana recharge and lives left.

      • evaluateBrickwalls

        public void evaluateBrickwalls()
        Draws all brickwalls if not destroyed, otherwise sets sprites of destroyed brickwalls.

      • evaluateGremlins

        public void evaluateGremlins()
        Ticks and draws all gremlins and spawns slimes according to enemy cooldown. Changes gremlin sprites to blue if frozen.

      • evaluateSlimes

        public void evaluateSlimes()
        Ticks and draws all slimes. If they have collided, remove them from the slimes ArrayList.

      • evaluateFireballs

        public void evaluateFireballs()
        Ticks and draws all fireballs. If they have collided, remove them from the fireballs ArrayList.

      • nextLevel

        public void nextLevel()
        Evalues what happens next when the wizard reaches the door. If there are still levels left, player goes to the next level. If there are no leveles left, player wins.

      • lostLife

        public void lostLife()
        Evaluates what happens next when the wizard loses a life. If it still has lives, simply run setup again and minus a life. If no lives are left, game over.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draw all elements in the game by current frame.
        Overrides:
        draw in class processing.core.PApplet

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
